cards.header: Nubwahe buhinga bw'urufatiro kugira umuntu ashobore kuronka inyishu nyishi zishoboka muri interview?

cards.text:
## Muriki cirwa muraza kwiga:  
• Ingene ushobora gutegura imibonano ya interview  
• Ingene ushobora kuronka inkuru yagakura mubaguha inkuru  
• Ibibazo bimwe bimwe vy'urufatiro kugira ushobore gutanguza interview

Gutegura neza ikiyago gihagarikiye kubazwa ibibazo (interview) n’ubumenyi bwigwa. Mugice giheruka, warize ingene umenya abagushikiriza inkuru hamwe n’inkuru z’ubwoko butandukanye bafititye uburenganzira bwogushikiriza. Muriki gice uzokwiga ingene wiyegereza umuntu inkuru yerekeye canke uwuyiguha, kugira uronke amakuru ukeneye yogushikiriza mugikorwa cawe. 
Ibiyago bimwe bishobora kuba vyateguwe imbere. Bimwe biranyaruka, ntivyateguwe imbere yigihe kandi bikorerwa aho inkuru yashikiye. Abashikirizamakuru beza kenshi baba bafise abobazinanye basanzwe babaha amakuru --- abahinga nka batanga amakuru bavyigiye canke abantu bubahwa muvyo bavuze --- Bashobora kubasaba ikiyago gihagarikiye kubazwa ibibazo (interview) mu kiringo gito  arihamwe hadutse inkuru ishushe canke hageze kuyishikiriza.  
Ubwoko bw’inkuru uriko urakorerako hamwe nigihe uyiteguriyeko bizogutahuza ubuhinga ukoresha hamwe nubushobozi bwawe bwogushira mungiro ingigo zerekanywe ngaha. Gufata amajwi y’ikiyago gihagarikiye kubazwa ibibazo (interview) bifise ivyo bisaba bidasanzwe: ukeneye kumenya neza yuko ufise amakuru afashwe ashobora gukoreshwa. Ibi bizosubirwamwo neza mubice vyerekeye amajwi hamwe n’amasanamu.

![Ubwoko bwahava Inkuru](2.png)  
Ubwoko bwaho uriko urakura inkuru hamwe nakamaro biza kugira ku nkuru yawe nivyo bigomba kwerekana ingene ibibazo ubaza biza kumera. Nigitigiri c'umwanya ufise navyo nyene biraza kugira ingaruka kukungene utunganya iyo interview yawe.

## Kwitegurira ikiyago gihagarikiye kubazwa ibibazo (interview)  
### Ugushaka kumenya ibiranga umuntu canke ibintu (contexte)  
Gira ubushakashatsi imbere y'ikiyago iyo bishoboka. Uzobaza ibibazo vyiza kandi bijanye cane. Birafasha kumenya gato ivyerekeye umuntu uriko urabaza ibibazo.  
### Tegura ibibazo vy'intangamarara  
Vyama minsi yose ari iciyumviro ciza kuba ufise ibibazo bisanzwe wateguye. Bituma udata umwanya kandi bigatuma ikiyago kigumana intumbero.

## Akarorero k’inyandiko ziteguwe neza zerekeye ikiyago gihagarikiye kubazwa ibibazo (interview)  
### Ibitangura canke ibimenyereza mubibazo  
**Baza ibi kare kugira utume uwubazwa yoroherwa muriwe; nibibazo vyoroshe kandi biterekeye umuntu**  
• Mwitwa gute (kandi mujejwe iki) nkuko mwifuzako tuvyandika? (Mwibuke neza gusuzuma ingene amazina yandikwa  --- naho bisa nkuko vyoroshe)  
• Mwize he?  
• Nibiki mukoresha kandi nikuki mubikoresha?  
### Ibibazo nyamukuru  
**Aha niho ukura inkuru ziryoshe kandi zikenewe zo gukoreshwa **  
• Wobwira gute abandi akamaro k’akazi kawe?  
• Nibiki vyoba vyaragufashije canke bikaguha icifuzo cokugira ibibicapo?  
• Ni gute ubuhinga butandukanye bwoba bwarafashije icivugo hamwe nibiri muvyo ibicapo vyawe vyerekana?  
• Niki abacapa bafasha mumihana yanyu?  
### Ibibazo bisozera  
**Aha niho ubariza ibibazo bigoye canke bikarishe, bikurikirana nibibazo vyanyuma biri munsi**  
• abakunegura baguva yuko uri umucafyi womubarabara canke uwigana ibicapo asanzwe. Wishura iki abobakunegura?  
• Hari ikindi kintu mwoba mwifuza kongerako canke mwoba mwibaza yuko gikenewe kumenywa nabadukurikirana?

cards.header: Akarorero kingene ushobora gutangura umubonano bimwe bita interview

cards.text:
## Tunganya iryungane rimwe risigura inkuru yawe ubwira uwukeneye kwaza kuguha inkuru.  
Ugomba gutomorera uwuguha inkuru iciyo nkuru yawe yerekeye. Ibi bizotuma uwo muntu aguha inkuru aguma agukurikira yongere aguhe ninyishu zikenewe.

## Kugira ikiyago gihagarikiye kubazwa ibibazo (interview)  
### Kwivuga uwuriwe nk’umumenyeshamakuru  
Kenshi ibi bizoba bisanzwe bizwi mugabo si mubihe vyose. Ibi birakenewe cane iyo ari kuri internet. N’inyifato ikenewe kandi ijanye n’akazi cane kubigira naho hariho igihe bidakenewe (ibindi vyerekeye ibi, raba igice 8 kurugezo (normes) rw'inyifato runtu (éthique) nu rw'akazi (professionnelsl).  
Menyesha uwuriko urabaza nyamba wewe canke uwundi mumenyeshamakuru azagukoresha  camera mugufata amafoto canke amasanamu --- Uwuriko urabaza ntasange atavyiteze canke atiteguye. Mu bibanza bimwe harakenerwa uruhusha rudasanzwe kugira hafatwe amafoto canke amajwi. Menya amategeko iyo uriko urakora inkuru. Nyamba hakenewe uruhusha, baza uwuguha inkuru imbere yuko utangura ikiyago kandi usubire ubaze ninyuma yaco kugira uzobe ubifise muvyo wafashe.  
### Tangurira kubibazo bisanzwe  
Bivanye n’umwanya ufise ingene ungana, ningirakamaro gutangurira kubibazo bisanzwe, bitagorana. Fasha abantu koroherwa muribo imbere yuko utangura kubaza ibibazo bigoye kwihanganira canke bitoroshe. Bishobora gufasha abantu kumenya uwuriwe.  
### Kurongora ikiyago gihagarikiye kubazwa ibibazo (interview)  
Abantu bamwe bamwe baba bafise ivyobizeye murico kiyago bidahuye nivyo wewe ufise. Abanyepolitik bagerageza incuro nyinshi guhindura ikiyago bagitumbereza mukiganiro cerekeye ibibafitiye akamaro. Abanyagihugu badashaka kumenywa batamenyereye ingene ikiyago gihagarikiye kubazwa ibibazo (interview) gitunganywa kenshi bavuga ibintu bitanjanye n’imvugo yaco. Urakeneye kuvugana urupfasoni mugabo ugakomera mu kurongora ikiyago. Kwivugana ntana rimwe bitanga inkuru nkuko yoba ari ikiyago gihagarikiye kubazwa ibibazo (interview) no gutanga inyishu zigufi kandi zijanye.  
### Ntiwihutire kuronka inyishu  
Mugihe rero ari vyiza kurongora ingene ikiyago kigenda, ni vyiza kureka abantu bagaheza iciyumviro cabo. Abantu bakunda kuvuga mumwanya hari agacerere cane gusumba nivyo baribakwiriye kuvuga.  
### Gusiguza no gutomora  
Rimwe na rimwe abaguha amakuru usanga batazi kwishura ibibazo batormora. Ikindi gihe, bakabigira babishaka kugira birinde kwishura ikibazo. Murubwo burorero bubiri, ushobora kubaza ikibazo cawe muyindi nzira:  
Sometimes it helps to restate the answer to the source: “so, you are saying that…” as a way to confirm an answer. With politicians it may help to ask a more general version of a question if they refuse to answer it specifically.  
Rimwe na rimwe birafasha gusubiramwo inyishu y’uwuguha inkuru: “Uti rero uvuze yuko…” kugira wemeze inyishu. Kubanyepolitik bishobora gufasha kubaza ikibazo gifatiye muri rusangi nyamba banse kucishura kibajije n’intumbero.

cards.header: Akarorero kingene ushobora kurongora umubonano wa interview, guhinyanyura ibibazo canke gutanga umuco kurivyo

cards.text:
### Baza ibibazo bijanye nuko ikiyago kiro kigenda  
Ntugume wisunga gusa ibibazo wateguye hamwe nogufata inyandiko canke amajwi gushika aho wibagira kubaza ibibazo bijanye nuko ikiyago kiro kigenda. Rimwe na rimwe, amakuru ngirakamaro cane ava munyishu zibibazo utigeze utegura kubaza.  
### Rekera ibibazo bikomeye ku mpera y'ikiyago  
Nkumushikirizamakuru urakeneye gukara. Ubwirizwa kubaza ibibazo bigoye hamwe nokubironkera inyishu. Uburyo bwiza bwokubishikako nikurekera ibibazo bitoroshe bikabazwa munyuma. Gutya uba wamaze kuronka ivyo ushikiriza nyamba uwubibajije ashavujwe nivyo bibazo vyawe bitoroshe.

cards.header: Akarorero k'ingene umuntu ashobora kubaza ikibazo c'inkora mutima akongera akarangiza interview

cards.text:
### Gusozera ikiyago gihagarikiye kubazwa ibibazo (interview)  
Vyama minsi yose ari inciyumviro ciza gusozera ikiyago gihagarikiye kubazwa ibibazo (interview) n'ibibazo bibiri:  
• **“Hari ikindi kintu mwoba mwifuza kuvuga?”**  
Ibi biha uwuguha inkuru (source) akaryo ko kukubwira amakuru akenewe kuri canke kwishura ibibazo utigeze wiyumvira kubaza.  
• **“Birashoboka kubarondera kandi nyamba mfise ibindi bibazo?”**  
Ibi bizogushoboza kugira urukurikirane rw'inkuru arihamwe wewe canke uwuhingura inkuru (editeur) yifuza gusobanukirwa ku kintu canke hariciyongeyeko mu nkuru woba ukeneye kuronkera inyishu.

## IBINTU VYO KWIBUKA  
• Itegurire ikiyago cawe gihagarikiye kubazwa ibibazo (interview). Gira ubushakashatsi. Ube ufise ibibazo bimwe biteguye.  
• Ibintu bimwe bigorana munteguro y’ikiyago ciza n’umwanya, abaguha amakuru bakekeranya canke bagoye.  
• Shira k’urutonde ibibazo vyawe hamwe no kumenya ikintu kimwe, gikomeye cane gusumba cerekeye inkuru wifuza ushaka kuronka kuruyo muntu agaha inkuru.  
• Gerageza kworohereza uwo muntu aguha inkuru.  
• Nyamba uwuguha inkuru agorana kubera atorpohewe muriwe canke kubera hari ikintu adashaka kukubwira, ikiyago gishobora kuba rimwe na rimwe kumengo muriko muraharira (négociation).  
• Nkumumenyeshamakuru ukwiriye gukara ariko utarenganya.  
• Rimwe na rimwe abatanga inkuru baramenya yuko inyishu ataco ishikirije canke idatomoye kukibazo bizo baha izina ribi mubinyamakuru gusumba batanze inyishu igororotse. Haraho wokenera kubivuga.  
• Inkuru yawe izoryoha gusumba niyaba ibiyago vyawe bihagarikiye kubazwa ibibazo (interviews) birimwo abantu badasangiye ivyiyumviro.

cards.question: Nivyahe bintu ugomba gukora mugihe woba uriko ubaza ibibazo umuntu akekeranya mukwishura?

choices.text: Baza igituma akekeranya, hama wongere urabe ko inyishu kurico kibazo mwoyunvikana.
Ku muntu wigihagararo gikomeye mu reta, ushobora kumenyesha ko "kutagira ico avuze" ku kintu bishobora kumuzanira ishusho mbi.

cards.question: Nivyo canke Sivyo: Nimba uwuriko agirishwa interview atevye kwishura ikibazo ca nkenerwa, kiretse kumusubiriramwo ikibazo mubundi buryo butandukanye canke kumufasha kugitahura mubundi buryo, ugomba guca ucihoza.
Nicahe muri ibi bintu utagomba kwigera ukora uriko uragira umubonano wo mubwoko bwa interview:

choices.text: Reka ikiganiro gihagarare mumwanya wose uza kumera nkuwutangaje.
Mu mpera za interview, baza uwo muntu ko ataco afise yokwunganira.
